name: dicom-send
label: DICOM Send
description: The DICOM Send Gear uses DCMTK dcmstoresu to send DICOM data from Flywheel to a DICOM server.  The DICOM server must be reachable from the host of the Flywheel instance.

file.description: Any DICOM file(s), or an archive containing DICOM file(s). Non DICOM files will be ignored.

destination.description: The IP address or hostname of the destination DICOM server

called_ae.description: The Called AE title of the recieving DICOM server. The Calling AE is set to flywheel.

port.description: Port number of the listening DICOM service.

author: Imad Nijim
